thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Owen

author: Owen
title: Owen
text: They are terrible. My dad passed away suddenly and my mother did not feel like going to Hawaii with us. We called Air Canada and explained what happen. They advise us that we are eligible for a refund, but since we booked flighthub we would need to deal with flighthub.ca and they would be the one to process our refund. Called flighthub 4x, Very RUDE customer service and even the supervisor. I always book my flights with flighthub but now never again!!!!
